actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: To apply the expanded definition of disposable retired pay used for computation of the maximum amount of a former spouse's share of military retired pay to divorces that become final before the effective date of amendments made by Public Law 101-510 as well as those after that date.

summary.text: Amends the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1991 to apply an expanded definition of disposable military retired pay (for purposes of determining a former spouse's share of such pay) to all divorces, dissolutions, annulments, and legal separations, whether they become final before, on, or after the enactment of such Act.

titles.title: To apply the expanded definition of disposable retired pay used for computation of the maximum amount of a former spouse's share of military retired pay to divorces that become final before the effective date of amendments made by Public Law 101-510 as well as those after that date.
